text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ObservationType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ObservationDiagnosisTypes
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-LogicalObservationIdentifierNamesAndCodes
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ObservationSeriesType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ObservationSequenceType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-AnnotationType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ObservationIntoleranceType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ObservationIssueTriggerCodedObservationType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-MedicationObservationType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ObservationActContextAgeType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-GeneticObservationType

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ObservationTypeObservationTypeIdentifies the kinds of observations that can be performed
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ObservationIssueTriggerCodedObservationTypeObservationIssueTriggerCodedObservationTypeDistinguishes the kinds of coded observations that could be the trigger for clinical issue detection. These are observations that are not measurable, but instead can be defined with codes. Coded observation types include: Allergy, Intolerance, Medical Condition, Pregnancy status, etc.
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _GeneticObservationTypeGeneticObservationType**Description:** None provided

name: ObservationType
title: ObservationType
description: Identifies the kinds of observations that can be performed
